text_logic_form: Triangles $1$ and $2$ are similar to each other.
dissolved_text_logic_form: Triangles $VGC$ and $BMH$ are similar to each other.
diagram_logic_form: The length of line $BM$ is $16$ units.
The length of line $VG$ is $12$ units.
The length of line $HM$ is $22$ units.
The length of line $GC$ is $x$ units.
The measure of angle $VGC$ is equal to the measure of angle $BMH$.
The measure of angle $GVC$ is equal to the measure of angle $MBH$.
line_instances: There are lines $VG$, $GC$, and $VC$ forming triangle $VGC$.
There are lines $BM$, $MH$, and $BH$ forming triangle $BMH$.
